titles.title: Patrick Underwood Federal Law Enforcement Protection Act of 2023
Patrick Underwood Federal Law Enforcement Protection Act of 2023
To amend title 18, United States Code, to increase certain penalties for assaulting, resisting, or impeding certain officers or employees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Patrick Underwood Federal Law Enforcement Protection Act of 2023
This bill revises the federal criminal statute that prohibits assaulting, resisting, or impeding certain federal officers or employees.
Among other changes, the bill increases the applicable penalties for such offenses.
